statements: SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT project_id, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, budget, status FROM projects ORDER BY budget DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, status FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT project_name, end_date, status FROM projects WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget < 10000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_status FROM initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE initiative_status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'completed' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'active';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM initiatives WHERE initiative_status = 'in progress';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT stakeholder_name, contact_email FROM stakeholders ORDER BY stakeholder_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM projects WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, status FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, progress_status FROM tasks JOIN progress ON tasks.task_id = progress.task_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, status FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM tasks ORDER BY due_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stakeholder_name, contact_info FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT task_name, progress_status, date_updated FROM tasks JOIN progress ON tasks.task_id = progress.task_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM TeamMembers ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT update_description, update_date FROM ProgressUpdates WHERE progress_status='Completed' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, total_budget, remaining_budget FROM Budget WHERE actual_cost > total_budget;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM Projects
SELECT task_name, status, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE status='In Progress'
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM TeamMembers ORDER BY role DESC
SELECT project_name, total_budget, actual_cost, remaining_budget FROM Projects JOIN Budget ON Projects.project_id = Budget.project_id
SELECT task_name, update_description, progress_status FROM Tasks JOIN ProgressUpdates ON Tasks.task_id = ProgressUpdates.task_id
